content:
Hello,

I have a question about the halfway handin for PS4. According to my grade book I did not receive credit for it because I "submitted late." However, I definitely submitted it on time, and I think I received this message because I accidentally resubmitted the halfway handin when trying to submit the actual Pset last Wednesday. Is there any way I can still receive credit on it?

Thank you,

Yucan
subject: Halfway Handin Ps4

content: Yes that is why it says that message. I just reset your counter so you can get credit.
